item.title: Flytipping, 26th August
item.description:
On the public footpath leading into Mottingham Woods six empty nitreous oxide containers have been fly tipped. Go to 115 New Street Hill cross the railway bridge, immediately turn right and at the foot of the London Borough of Bromley sign are the cannisters
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Garden Lane, Sundridge, London
